name: VIOLET: Space Mission
description: Violet: Space Mission is a 2D precision action game in space, about dodging asteroids, data collection and space exploration. You are Candidate Alpha, sent on the Violet Programme for this mission. Good luck and godspeed.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP, 7 Processor: 1.2 Ghz+ Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 384 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win XP, 7 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 384 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Never thought space could be simulated so in 2D. Controls are tough and the journey even tougher, Frustrating at times, completing missions gives a feeling of satisfaction, even to the point of bragging rights.  The game brings back nostalgia when spoon feeding gamers were never in game design and players were treated intelligently. Not to mention the wonderful art style and soundtracks, The feeling of isolation like Gravity is always looming as I play.  I would love to see a leaderboard if possible.
